Uses of Interface
common.msg.IRoomMsg

  • Packages that use IRoomMsg 
    Package Description
    common
    Group B's API interfaces.
    common.msg
    A package for all messages which are sent between users through a data packet.
    common.msg.room
    Action messages to be sent at the room level.
    common.msg.status
    A package for messages received by a user after they send a message.
    common.msg.status.network  
    yx48_zh16.client.clientMiniMVC.clientMiniModel
    The definition of a client model and classes.
    yx48_zh16.client.clientMVC.clientModel
    The implementation of a client model and related classes.
    yx48_zh16.realgame.model
    The model of the game app.
    yx48_zh16.server.serverMiniMVC.serverMiniModel

    Some messages used in game communication.
    yx48_zh16.server.serverMVC.serverModel

    • Uses of IRoomMsg in common.msg.room

      Classes in common.msg.room with type parameters of type IRoomMsg 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  IAddCommandMsg<M extends IRoomMsg>
      A message containing the type ID of an unknown message and a command to process a message of that type.
      Whenever a room member receives a IRequestCommandMsg from another member in the room, they should respond by sending back an IAddCommandMsg containing the requested command.
      Subinterfaces of IRoomMsg in common.msg.room 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  IAddCommandMsg<M extends IRoomMsg>
      A message containing the type ID of an unknown message and a command to process a message of that type.
      Whenever a room member receives a IRequestCommandMsg from another member in the room, they should respond by sending back an IAddCommandMsg containing the requested command.
      interface  IAddMemberMsg
      A message that lets a user be added to a room.
      interface  ILeaveMsg
      A message that lets a user leave a room.
      interface  IProvideAppMsg
      A message that contains the IApplication stub associated with the message's sender.
      interface  IRequestAppMsg
      A message requesting that the corresponding IApplication stub be sent back to the sender using an IProvideAppMsg.
      interface  IRequestCommandMsg
      A message containing the ID of an unknown message.
      interface  ISyncRoomMsg
      Message to update room with most up-to-date version of room
      Methods in common.msg.room with type parameters of type IRoomMsg

      Subinterfaces of IRoomMsg in common.msg.status.network 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  IRemoteExceptionMsg
      Special message for handling exceptions thrown while trying to reach a remote entity.
      interface  IRoomCheckStatusMsg
      IRoomCheckStatusMsg is sent to a specific message receiver to check their status.
      interface  IRoomOkStatusMsg
      Response message for an IRoomCheckStatusMsg
      interface  IServerCheckStatusMsg
      IServerCheckStatusMsg is special message sent to the server to check its status.
      interface  IServerOkStatusMsg
      Response message from Server to an IServerCheckStatusMsg.
